name: VR cute tanks: Girls and Dinosaurs
name_original: VR cute tanks: Girls and Dinosaurs
description:
In this VR cute tanks: Girls and Dinosaurs, you can imitate a real armored soldier in a thrilling battle, choose to drive a powerful tiger to dominate the battlefield, demonstrating the bravery of all enemies; or drive a brisk firefly on the battlefield Interspersed on the roundabout, hit Axis by surprise.
If you are tired the battlefield, here will also provide you with an entertainment mode, use tanks to tease girls in Fantasyland, or gallop to hunt dinosaurs in the Jurassic period.


Instructions
Normal mode:
The left controller touchpad controls movement; the menu button is used for menu; the trigger selects the level, and the settings are modified.
The touchpad on the right controller controls the rotation of the turret, and the trigger fires
Dinosaur, girl mode:
The menu button on the left controller opens/closes the menu, the trigger selects settings
The menu button on the right controller to fire, and the side button opens/closes the operation instructions
